author: cbs8
title: Force Protection Video Equipment Competing In the Body Camera Market - BrokerBank Securities Provides Due Diligence Report
text:
BrokerBank Securities, Inc.
NEW YORK , Oct. 19, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Force Protection Video Equipment Corp. (OTCBB: FPVD) closed Friday's trading session at $1.61 up 4.5%. Trading volume was over 300k for the second straight session. FPVD shares traded as high as $23.96 briefly in July then began falling to the current price level in August and have remained in the $1 to $2 price range since.
Interested parties will want to read our due diligence on Force Protection Video Equipment. Get our due diligence report at the link below. There is no cost to read the full report.
http://bit.ly/-FPVD_Due_Diligence
Copy and paste to browser may be required.
About Force Protection Video Equipment Corp.
Force Protection Video Equipment supplies on the body HD video cameras to law enforcement and Military. Force Protection Video has over 30 years of experience in supplying state of the art video and audio equipment to law enforcement.

COMPLIANCE PROCEDURE

Affiliated parties involved with producing and issuing this release have not been compensated in any form by any source. A full disclaimer can be found by viewing due diligence. We are only human and may make mistakes. If you notice any errors or omissions, please notify us below.
